title: Web Developer
name: Name
aboutText:
I’m Victor Abeledo, a computer systems analyst graduate and programmer. I freelance using the most suited tools for the project I’m working with. Some of my personal favorites: React, Express, Word Press, C#.
I live and work in Rosario, one of the most beautiful cities in Argentina.
I love traveling and learning new languages, up to this moment I know how to speak in English, Spanish and a bit of Italian, which I’m still learning in my spare time.
I’m a proud owner of a longboard and I ride it when I can, trying not to fall off it!
I’m available for hire for web development tasks or projects, be it backend or frontend work.
aboutDescription: Superstar full-stack developer looking for the next challenge to face
nataliaCuelloDesc: Simple wordpress site for online psychological counseling.
cuerpoAppDesc: Progressive web app to keep track of GYM routines. Made with React and Spring boot.
